ProjectDescr.Title: The effect of SARS-CoV-2 infection on Helicobacter pylori infected stomach
ProjectDescr.Description: To investigate the effect of SARS-CoV-2 infection on the stomach, especially Helicobacter pylori (H. pylori) infected stomach, we used H. pylori mouse model followed by SARS-CoV-2 infection. Stomach tissues were collected at 7days post SARS-CoV-2 infection from mock infected group and SARS-CoV-2 infected group. In addition, either mock or SARS-CoV-2 was infected at 4weeks post H. pylori infection and stomach tissues were collected at 20weeks post H. pylori infection from each group.

Grant.Title: Preclinical experiment and research on infectious diseases to build infrastructure database
